items.title: Sales of heavy trucks are falling like the U.S. is headed for a recession
items.description: Heavy trucks sales have dropped to levels not seen in four years, according to the U.S. Bureau of Economic Analysis.

items.title: Sticky UK inflation unlikely to move the needle for Bank of England
items.description: The Bank of England is watching inflation data closely after forecasting the consumer price index could peak at 4% in September.

items.title: Bessent sees trade deal likely with China before November deadline on reciprocal tariffs
items.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent appeared Tuesday on CNBC's "Squawk Box" program.

items.title: TikTok 'framework' deal overshadows U.S.-China trade talks
items.description: Talks on trade were overshadowed by a "framework" deal regarding the social media platform, announced by Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent Monday.

items.title: UK economy stalls in July, as slowdown sets in
items.description: Economists expect a slowdown to take hold of the U.K. in the latter half of 2025.
